name: collection1
title: scanner
common_story: A group of friends decided to unleash their creativity with doodles and scanner tests, leaving playful trails and colorful tests behind. They seemed to share a knack for turning ordinary tasks into fun little adventures.

name: collection2
title: test collection
common_story: A group of friends decided to have some fun testing out a scanner, doodling trees and drawing squiggly paths, while repeatedly jotting down playful notes about their scanning experiments.
